sentences.sentence: Bungy and I had had an ambivalent relationship over years.
sentences.translation: 我和邦迪多年来有着好恶参半的关系。

sentences.sentence: Bungy the budgie has found a novel way of keeping cool this summer.
sentences.translation: 虎皮鹦鹉邦吉今年夏天找到了一个保持凉爽的新奇办法。

sentences.sentence: I would do the things I have always wanted to do while I am able. Skydive, bungy jump, go on a cruise.
sentences.translation: 我将在身体还可以的时候去做自己一直想做的事情，跳伞，蹦极，豪华邮轮旅行。
